column5: This was me and Chad's hell Tuesday AM...I shudder at the sight of this photo...
NOT fun!!  That pic brings back some horrible memories...
Reminds me of trout opener on Joe last year, lol.

Blaaaaah!  Remember getting the Bravo bogged down in slush like that while giving a pregnant woman in early labor a lift to the hospital.  I had to kick her off and make her walk with wet boots the last few hundred meters along the riverbank.  Her phat arse off the back I got the sled out and off the water. lol.  NAW said it... No fun.
Ahhh... the memories..  Why I carry a shovel, snow shoes and sometimes a bumper jack.

Blaaaaah!  Remember getting the Bravo bogged down in slush like that while giving a pregnant woman in early labor a lift to the hospital.  I had to kick her off and make her walk with wet boots the last few hundred meters along the riverbank.  Her phat arse off the back I got the sled out and off the water. lol.   Stompin' Tom could have made a song about that I'm sure!
Stompin' Tom could have made a song about that I'm sure!  Haha!  That'd have been great.  Wayne... those big sleds are soooo nasty to get unstuck.  The worst.
Reminds me of a video I made a few years ago  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZVoFL_JakaE
That's what you guys get for chasing Trout. Walleye lakes are all solid.
Blair we hammered the specks though...NOT!  Bunk if I had a bravo there'd be nothing to complain about....just pick er up and be done with it
The slush was garbage. The fishing was garbage.  Luckily the weather was nice.
